description: This file defines a React functional component called Layout, which provides the main structure and layout for pages in an academic learning management system frontend. It includes a health check banner, sidebar navigation, header with user info, and main content area.

methods.name: Layout({ children, user, onSignOut, backendHealthy = true, healthChecked = false })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the main layout, including health banner, sidebar, header, and children content.
